data.title: SMOKIN PIG SOUTH CAROLINA
data.text:
SANDWICHES

(*Served with 1 side)

Chopped Pork

$10.99*

Our delicious pulled pork served with a bun. Enough to feed the hungriest!!!

$10.99*

Juicy and tender BBQ chicken, smoked for hours to acchieve the perfect flavor.

$12.99*

The most tender brisket in South Carolina that will melt in your mouth.
